channel.title: Hacks on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hacks on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Emmy Winner Hannah Einbinder Explains Her “Free Palestine” On-Stage Comment
item.description: “I feel like it’s my obligation as a Jewish person to distinguish Jews from the state of Israel,” she said, in part, while backstage after her win for her role in ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Emmy Winner Hannah Einbinder Explains Her “Free Palestine” On-Stage Comment
item.description: “I feel like it’s my obligation as a Jewish person to distinguish Jews from the state of Israel,” she said, in part, while backstage after her win for her role in ‘Hacks.’

item.title: No, Hannah, That Wasn’t Brave (Guest Column)
item.description: True courage would have meant calling for peace, for coexistence, for the humanity of both Israelis and Palestinians, even if it risked boos instead of applause, writes Israeli activist Hen Mazzig.

item.title: No, Hannah, That Wasn’t Brave (Guest Column)
item.description: True courage would have meant calling for peace, for coexistence, for the humanity of both Israelis and Palestinians, even if it risked boos instead of applause, writes Israeli activist Hen Mazzig.

item.title: Emmys: Hannah Einbinder Says “F*** ICE and Free Palestine” After Best Supporting Actress in a Comedy Win
item.description: Einbinder won the Emmy for her role as Ava Daniels in ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Emmys: Hannah Einbinder Says “F*** ICE and Free Palestine” After Best Supporting Actress in a Comedy Win
item.description: Einbinder won the Emmy for her role as Ava Daniels in ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Apple’s Big Bet to Eliminate the iPhone’s Most Targeted Vulnerabilities
item.description: Alongside new iPhones, Apple released a new security architecture on Tuesday: Memory Integrity Enforcement aims to eliminate the most frequently exploited class of iOS bugs.

item.title: Apple’s Big Bet to Eliminate the iPhone’s Most Targeted Vulnerabilities
item.description: Alongside new iPhones, Apple released a new security architecture on Tuesday: Memory Integrity Enforcement aims to eliminate the most frequently exploited class of iOS bugs.

item.title: How ‘The Studio,’ ‘The Traitors,’ ‘Hacks’ and Other Emmy-nominated Shows Told Their Stories with Picture-Perfect Locations
item.description: The process of securing the proper locations for a project is a metaphorical game of 3D chess in which the artistic vision of its creative team wages a strategic battle with logistical necessities and

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Bryan Cranston and Julianne Nicholson Win for Guest Acting in a Comedy Series
item.description: Cranston won for his role as Griffin Mill in ‘The Studio’ and Nicholson for her portrayal of Dance Mom on ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Bryan Cranston and Julianne Nicholson Win for Guest Acting in a Comedy Series
item.description: Cranston won for his role as Griffin Mill in ‘The Studio’ and Nicholson for her portrayal of Dance Mom on ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Automated Sextortion Spyware Takes Webcam Pics of Victims Watching Porn
item.description: A new specimen of “infostealer” malware offers a disturbing feature: It monitors a target’s browser for NSFW content, then takes simultaneous screenshots and webcam photos of the victim.

item.title: Automated Sextortion Spyware Takes Webcam Pics of Victims Watching Porn
item.description: A new specimen of “infostealer” malware offers a disturbing feature: It monitors a target’s browser for NSFW content, then takes simultaneous screenshots and webcam photos of the victim.

item.title: Inside the Multimillion-Dollar Gray Market for Video Game Cheats
item.description: Gaming cheats are the bane of the video game industry—and a hot commodity. A recent study found that cheat creators are making a fortune from gamers looking to gain a quick edge.

item.title: Inside the Multimillion-Dollar Gray Market for Video Game Cheats
item.description: Gaming cheats are the bane of the video game industry—and a hot commodity. A recent study found that cheat creators are making a fortune from gamers looking to gain a quick edge.

item.title: A Special Diamond Is the Key to a Fully Open Source Quantum Sensor
item.description: Quantum sensors can be used in medical technologies, navigation systems, and more, but they’re too expensive for most people. That’s where the Uncut Gem open source project comes in.

item.title: A Special Diamond Is the Key to a Fully Open Source Quantum Sensor
item.description: Quantum sensors can be used in medical technologies, navigation systems, and more, but they’re too expensive for most people. That’s where the Uncut Gem open source project comes in.

item.title: It Looks Like a School Bathroom Smoke Detector. A Teen Hacker Showed It Could Be an Audio Bug
item.description: A pair of hackers found that a vape detector often found in high school bathrooms contained microphones—and security weaknesses that could allow someone to turn it into a secret listening device.

item.title: It Looks Like a School Bathroom Smoke Detector. A Teen Hacker Showed It Could Be an Audio Bug
item.description: A pair of hackers found that a vape detector often found in high school bathrooms contained microphones—and security weaknesses that could allow someone to turn it into a secret listening device.

item.title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren and ‘Hacks’ Creator Paul W. Downs Talk Colbert Cancellation and Censorship (Exclusive)
item.description: In a video produced by Warren’s team, the Senator FaceTimed into the ‘Hacks’ writers room to discuss the show and Warren’s presidential library bill.

item.title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren and ‘Hacks’ Creator Paul W. Downs Talk Colbert Cancellation and Censorship (Exclusive)
item.description: In a video produced by Warren’s team, the Senator FaceTimed into the ‘Hacks’ writers room to discuss the show and Warren’s presidential library bill.

item.title: How Julianne Nicholson’s Comedic Role in ‘Hacks’ Changed Everything: ‘I’m Actually Really Funny Too!’
item.description: Julianne Nicholson may live quietly in the English countryside, but this Emmy season, she’s making noise in Hollywood. With two Emmy nominations — for her haunting turn in Hulu’s post-apoc

item.description: Julianne Nicholson may live quietly in the English countryside, but this Emmy season, she’s making noise in Hollywood. With two Emmy nominations — for her haunting turn in Hulu’s post-apoc

item.title: A Premium Luggage Service's Web Bugs Exposed the Travel Plans of Every User—Including Diplomats
item.description: Security flaws in Airportr, a door-to-door luggage checking service used by 10 airlines, let hackers access user data and even gain privileges that would have let them redirect or steal luggage.

item.title: A Premium Luggage Service's Web Bugs Exposed the Travel Plans of Every User—Including Diplomats
item.description: Security flaws in Airportr, a door-to-door luggage checking service used by 10 airlines, let hackers access user data and even gain privileges that would have let them redirect or steal luggage.
